trunk.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the thick central woody stem of a tree
trunk.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He left his bicycle leaning against a tree trunk.
the trunk of an old oak tree
trunk.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the part at the back of a car where you can put bags, tools etc
trunk.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Put your suitcase in the trunk.
trunk.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: the very long nose of an elephant
trunk.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a piece of clothing like very short trousers, worn by men for swimming
trunk.translation[0].definitions[4].defi: a very large box made of wood or metal, in which clothes, books etc are stored or packed for travel
trunk.translation[0].definitions[5].defi: the main part of your body, not including your head, arms, or legs
